duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage Rehabilitative care to ensure optimum outcomes for patients.
Provide program orientation to patients/families/caregivers and coordinate patient/family/caregiver education.
Facilitate the involvement of the patient throughout the rehabilitation process.
Document the findings of the Discharge Planning Evaluation (DPE) and communicate the social, financial, or discharge needs and preferences of the patient/family/caregiver.
Assume accountability for promoting consistent, positive patient interactions that advance the agenda of unparalleled patient service.

education_certification.credential: Associate Degree in Nursing, required. Bachelor's Degree in Nursing, preferred. Case Management certification, preferred. Current Texas licensure with State Board of Nurse Examiners as an RN
